s.text: Like Dan Quayle on Letterman . Like how come capitalism forgot the need for the worker-consumer?

Like Dan Quayle on Letterman . Like how come capitalism forgot the need for the worker-consumer?
This is the creative poor, friends and neighbors, just ask my landlord.
